mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_BOARD.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, MEM_NO, TYPE_NO) VALUES ('[리뷰]', #{boardContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 1, 2)

SELECT SEQ_BOARD_STAR.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD_STAR (STAR, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, MEM_NO, BOARD_NO) VALUES (#{star}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 1, #{boardNo})
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, B.MEM_NO AS memNo, M.NICKNAME AS nickName, B.BOARD_CONTENT AS boardContent, TO_CHAR(B.CREATED_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS createdDate, TO_CHAR(B.UPDATED_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS updatedDate, /* 별점 */ ( SELECT S.STAR FROM BOARD_STAR S WHERE S.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND S.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS star, /* 대표 썸네일(첫 이미지 경로) */ ( SELECT I.FILE_PATH FROM BOARD_IMAGE I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS firstImagePath FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO WHERE B.TYPE_NO = 2 ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, B.MEM_NO AS memNo, M.NICKNAME AS nickName, B.BOARD_CONTENT AS boardContent, TO_CHAR(B.CREATED_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS createdDate, TO_CHAR(B.UPDATED_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS updatedDate, ( SELECT S.STAR FROM BOARD_STAR S WHERE S.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND S.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS star, ( SELECT I.FILE_PATH FROM BOARD_IMAGE I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) AS firstImagePath FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO WHERE B.TYPE_NO = 2 AND B.BOARD_NO < #{ltBoardNo} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT FILE_NO AS fileNo, BOARD_NO AS boardNo, TYPE_NO AS typeNo, FILE_NAME AS fileName, FILE_PATH AS filePath, FILE_SIZE AS fileSize, FILE_TYPE AS fileType, TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS uploadDate FROM BOARD_IMAGE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY FILE_NO
